remarks: Distributive law for inner product.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipdir.g $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
ipdir.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` F ) $.
ip2di.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
ip2di.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
ip2di.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
ip2di.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
ip2di.5 $e |- ( ph -> D e. V ) $.
ip2di $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .+ B ) ., ( C .+ D ) ) = ( ( ( A ., C ) .+^ ( B ., D ) ) .+^ ( ( A ., D ) .+^ ( B ., C ) ) ) ) $.
